address: Topsail Road, Raleigh, North Carolina 27610, Winston-Salem, North Carolina
message: I would like to tell you that Joe Camel and the impact is a bad one. Your message is saying to kids that smoking is cool, smoking smoke because of a silly cartoon character. Who made up this character? Joe Camel is so not cool, but that does not communicate with Joe Camel. If you want to promote Camel cigarettes, then adults not cartoon characters. Cartoon characters appeal to children not adults. If you want adults to use your product, then use adults for your ads.
